content.overview: Casa de la Muralla offers an unparalleled Caribbean experience on the pristine shores of Tierrabomba Island. This exclusive beachfront villa combines colonial Colombian architecture with modern luxury, providing guests with direct beach access, panoramic ocean views, and the tranquility of island living—just a short boat ride from historic Cartagena. Perfect for families, groups, or romantic getaways seeking authentic coastal luxury away from crowded resorts.
content.location: Located on Tierrabomba Island, one of Cartagena's hidden gems, Casa de la Muralla is accessible via a scenic 15-minute boat ride from the city. The island offers pristine beaches, local fishing villages, and a peaceful escape from the mainland while remaining close to Cartagena's UNESCO World Heritage historic center, world-class restaurants, and vibrant nightlife.

hosts.bio: Your hosts are a local Cartagena family passionate about sharing the authentic beauty of Colombia's Caribbean coast. With deep roots in the region, they offer insider knowledge of hidden beaches, local seafood restaurants, and cultural experiences that typical tourists never discover.

seoLong: Experience true Caribbean luxury on Colombia's most exclusive island retreat. Casa de la Muralla represents the pinnacle of coastal living, combining beachfront privacy with easy access to Cartagena's cultural riches.

Unlike crowded mainland resorts, our island villa offers complete tranquility, authentic local experiences, and the kind of intimate luxury that discerning travelers seek. From sunrise yoga on your private beach to sunset cocktails overlooking the Caribbean, every moment is crafted for relaxation and connection.
